testcase.name: basic game flow
disconnected player overlay in players menu
should show error toast when username is empty
should show error toast when username is only whitespace
should allow joining game with valid username
should trim whitespace from username when joining
minimum player overlay appears with single player
minimum player overlay not present with two players
players menu minified by default with global toggle
shared area dynamic alignment - character selection stage
shared area dynamic alignment - opponent selection stage
ability_selection stage - knight (BATTLE_HOWL) skips to opponent_selection
ability_selection stage - archer (BOUNCING_ARROW) skips to opponent_selection
ability_selection stage - mage (FREEZE) goes to ability_opponent_selection
battle stage - player 1 wins
battle stage - player 2 wins
battle stage - draw with reroll
battle stage - reroll effect after loss
battle stage - draw with attack bonus effect
battle stage - level 2 knight loses and drops to level 1
card_draw stage - knight draws metal_armor successfully
card_draw stage - archer draws sacred_sword (restricted)
card_draw stage - knight draws golden_apple and heals
card_draw stage - knight draws magic_ball and levels up
card_draw stage - knight at max health draws golden_apple (no overheal)
character_select stage - knight not alive
character_select stage - mage not alive
character_select stage - archer not alive
character_select stage - knight has skip_turn effect
character_select stage - skip_turn effect removed after character selection
character_select stage - no character available shows Skip Turn button
character_select stage - Skip Turn button passes turn to next player
basic game flow
